thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Returns to Basketball Practice Following Terrifying ATV Accident
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Returns to Basketball Practice Following Terrifying ATV Accident

author: Leena Tailor
title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Returns to Basketball Practice Following Terrifying ATV Accident
text: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Returns to Basketball Practice Following Terrifying ATV Accident by Leena Tailor 8:45   Photo: Getty Images Jamie Lynn Spears’ daughter Maddie is back on the basketball court! Two weeks after a scary ATV accident that nearly claimed her life, the 8-year-old athlete was looking well-recovered as she ran around the court in a video shared by her mom on Instagram. A post shared by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Feb 21, 2017 at 6:04pm PST Maddie was submerged in water for two minutes after the off-road vehicle she was driving veered into a pond at the family’s Kentwood, Louisiana, home on Feb. 5, according to a police report obtained by ET . After she was rushed to the hospital, Maddie’s family members, including her aunt, Britney Spears, asked for prayers for the young girl’s health on social media. Discharged on Feb. 10 , Maddie was able to leave home and visit her school to deliver treats to her friends on Valentine’s Day. Looks like she is well on the way to a full recovery! See more on her Valentine’s Day outing below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
